artist: Artist: Morimura Yasumasa; Publisher: Peter Norton Family Christmas Projects, Pasadena, California
creditline: Gift of Joan Rothfuss and Paul Shambroom
description: hand-held folding fan with black ribs; photographic image on one side of a nude man wearing a long wig, feminine makeup and false breasts, in a pinup type of pose with PL arm behind head, partially covering face; red background; opposite side of fan is white with Japanese ink character, two spots and signature; wooden box with inscription on cover included; Peter Norton Family Christmas Project 1995 (greeting card included)
medium: Color photolithograph on folding paper fan, painted bamboo ribs, metal; housed in wood box
signed: on back of fan printed in black: Morimura
title: Aimai-no-bi (Ambiguous Beauty)
